verses.verse: <S%H8085>Listen<s%>, O <S%H339>isles<s%>, unto me; and <S%H7181>hearken<s%>, ye <S%H3816>people<s%>, from <S%H7350>far<s%>; The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H7121>called<s%> me from the <S%H990>womb<s%>; from the <S%H4578>bowels<s%> of my <S%H517>mother<s%> hath he made <S%H2142>mention<s%> of my <S%H8034>name<s%>.

And he hath <S%H7760>made<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> like a <S%H2299>sharp<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%>; in the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of his <S%H3027>hand<s%> hath he <S%H2244>hid<s%> me, and <S%H7760>made<s%> me a <S%H1305>polished<s%> <S%H2671>shaft<s%>; in his <S%H827>quiver<s%> hath he <S%H5641>hid<s%> me;
And <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, Thou art my <S%H5650>servant<s%>, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, in whom I will be <S%H6286>glorified<s%>.

Then I <S%H559>said<s%>, I have <S%H3021>laboured<s%> in <S%H7385>vain<s%>, I have <S%H3615>spent<s%> my <S%H3581>strength<s%> for <S%H8414>nought<s%>, and in <S%H1892>vain<s%>: yet <S%H403>surely<s%> my <S%H4941>judgment<s%> is with the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and my <S%H6468>work<s%> with my <S%H430>God<s%>.

¶ And now, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H3335>formed<s%> me from the <S%H990>womb<s%> to be his <S%H5650>servant<s%>, to <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to him, Though <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be not <S%H622>gathered<s%>, yet shall I be <S%H3513>glorious<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and my <S%H430>God<s%> shall be my <S%H5797>strength<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, It is a light <S%H7043>thing<s%> that thou shouldest be my <S%H5650>servant<s%> to raise <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and to <S%H7725>restore<s%> the <S%H5341%H5336>preserved<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: I will also <S%H5414>give<s%> thee for a <S%H216>light<s%> to the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%>, that thou mayest be my <S%H3444>salvation<s%> unto the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, the <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and his Holy <S%H6918>One<s%>, to him whom <S%H5315>man<s%> <S%H960>despiseth<s%>, to him whom the <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H8581>abhorreth<s%>, to a <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H4910>rulers<s%>, <S%H4428>Kings<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> and <S%H6965>arise<s%>, <S%H8269>princes<s%> also shall <S%H7812>worship<s%>, because of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that is <S%H539>faithful<s%>, and the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and he shall <S%H977>choose<s%> thee.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, In an <S%H7522>acceptable<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> have I <S%H6030>heard<s%> thee, and in a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3444>salvation<s%> have I <S%H5826>helped<s%> thee: and I will <S%H5341>preserve<s%> thee, and <S%H5414>give<s%> thee for a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, to <S%H6965>establish<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>, to cause to <S%H5157>inherit<s%> the <S%H8074>desolate<s%> <S%H5159>heritages<s%>;

That thou mayest <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H631>prisoners<s%>, Go <S%H3318>forth<s%>; to them that are in <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, <S%H1540>Shew<s%> yourselves. They shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> in the <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and their <S%H4830>pastures<s%> shall be in all high <S%H8205>places<s%>.

They shall not <S%H7456>hunger<s%> nor <S%H6770>thirst<s%>; neither shall the <S%H8273>heat<s%> nor <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H5221>smite<s%> them: for he that hath <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on them shall <S%H5090>lead<s%> them, even by the <S%H4002>springs<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> shall he <S%H5095>guide<s%> them.
And I will <S%H7760>make<s%> all my <S%H2022>mountains<s%> a <S%H1870>way<s%>, and my <S%H4546>highways<s%> shall be <S%H7311>exalted<s%>.
Behold, these shall <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H7350>far<s%>: and, lo, these from the <S%H6828>north<s%> and from the <S%H3220>west<s%>; and these from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5515>Sinim<s%>.

¶ <S%H7442>Sing<s%>, O <S%H8064>heavens<s%>; and be <S%H1523>joyful<s%>, O <S%H776>earth<s%>; and break <S%H6476>forth<s%> into <S%H7440>singing<s%>, O <S%H2022>mountains<s%>: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5162>comforted<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>, and will have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> upon his <S%H6041>afflicted<s%>.
But <S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> me, and my <S%H136>Lord<s%> hath <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> me.

Can a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> her sucking <S%H5764>child<s%>, that she should not have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on the <S%H1121>son<s%> of her <S%H990>womb<s%>? yea, they may <S%H7911>forget<s%>, yet will I not <S%H7911>forget<s%> thee.
Behold, I have <S%H2710>graven<s%> thee upon the palms of my <S%H3709>hands<s%>; thy <S%H2346>walls<s%> are <S%H8548>continually<s%> before me.
Thy <S%H1121>children<s%> shall make <S%H4116>haste<s%>; thy <S%H2040>destroyers<s%> and they that made thee <S%H2717>waste<s%> shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> of thee.

¶ Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and <S%H7200>behold<s%>: all these gather themselves <S%H6908>together<s%>, and <S%H935>come<s%> to thee. As I <S%H2416>live<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, thou shalt surely <S%H3847>clothe<s%> thee with them all, as with an <S%H5716>ornament<s%>, and <S%H7194>bind<s%> them on thee, as a <S%H3618>bride<s%> doeth.

For thy <S%H2723>waste<s%> and thy desolate <S%H8074>places<s%>, and the <S%H776>land<s%> of thy <S%H2035>destruction<s%>, shall even now be too <S%H3334>narrow<s%> by reason of the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%>, and they that swallowed thee <S%H1104>up<s%> shall be far <S%H7368>away<s%>.

The <S%H1121>children<s%> which thou shalt have, after thou hast <S%H7923>lost<s%> the other, shall <S%H559>say<s%> again in thine <S%H241>ears<s%>, The <S%H4725>place<s%> is too <S%H6862>strait<s%> for me: <S%H5066>give<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> to me that I may <S%H3427>dwell<s%>.

Then shalt thou <S%H559>say<s%> in thine <S%H3824>heart<s%>, Who hath <S%H3205>begotten<s%> me these, seeing I have lost my <S%H7921>children<s%>, and am <S%H1565>desolate<s%>, a <S%H1540>captive<s%>, and removing to and <S%H5493>fro<s%>? and who hath brought <S%H1431>up<s%> these? Behold, I was <S%H7604>left<s%> alone; these, <S%H375>where<s%> had they been?

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, Behold, I will lift <S%H5375>up<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> to the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%>, and set <S%H7311>up<s%> my <S%H5251>standard<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%>: and they shall <S%H935>bring<s%> thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> in their <S%H2684>arms<s%>, and thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall be <S%H5375>carried<s%> upon their <S%H3802>shoulders<s%>.

And <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall be thy nursing <S%H539>fathers<s%>, and their <S%H8282>queens<s%> thy nursing <S%H3243>mothers<s%>: they shall bow <S%H7812>down<s%> to thee with their <S%H639>face<s%> toward the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and lick <S%H3897>up<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of thy <S%H7272>feet<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: for they shall not be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> that <S%H6960>wait<s%> for me.
¶ Shall the <S%H4455>prey<s%> be <S%H3947>taken<s%> from the <S%H1368>mighty<s%>, or the <S%H6662>lawful<s%> <S%H7628>captive<s%> <S%H4422>delivered<s%>?

But thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, Even the <S%H7628>captives<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> shall be taken <S%H3947>away<s%>, and the <S%H4455>prey<s%> of the <S%H6184>terrible<s%> shall be <S%H4422>delivered<s%>: for I will <S%H7378>contend<s%> with him that <S%H3401>contendeth<s%> with thee, and I will <S%H3467>save<s%> thy <S%H1121>children<s%>.

And I will <S%H398>feed<s%> them that <S%H3238>oppress<s%> thee with their own <S%H1320>flesh<s%>; and they shall be <S%H7937>drunken<s%> with their own <S%H1818>blood<s%>, as with sweet <S%H6071>wine<s%>: and all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> am thy <S%H3467>Saviour<s%> and thy <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%>, the mighty <S%H46>One<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.
